name: ZANTARA
description: AI Assistant for Bali Zero - Intelligent automation and chat support
addedToSpaceText:
🤖 *ZANTARA Bot Activated!*

Hello! I'm ZANTARA, your AI assistant. I can help you with:

• 💬 Answer questions using GPT-4
• 📁 Manage Google Drive files
• 💾 Store and retrieve memories
• 📊 System status updates

Type *@ZANTARA help* to see all commands!
removedFromSpaceText: 👋 ZANTARA has been removed from this space. Thanks for using our AI assistant!
